channel.title: Starting a new server
channel.description: Hey im starting a new server and i need to know how big of a Vps do i need to hold at least 100 players on a modified PI source.

item.title: Starting a new server
item.dc:creator: @Scaar1 Scaar
item.description:
@Scaar1 wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:4, topic:430738”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=533415.msg3899372#msg3899372 date=1327621676]
Why think of a vps when starting a new server…?
[/quote]
He is free to do what he wants.

VPS questions go in general questions. The VPS size shouldn’t be an issue reaching 100 players, the fact that is a PI source is my main concern. If it can handle the amount of players, you should be fine.[/quote]

The source im working from holds 100-200 players every day

Read full topic

item.title: Starting a new server
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

arham 4:

Why think of a vps when starting a new server…?

He is free to do what he wants.

VPS questions go in general questions. The VPS size shouldn’t be an issue reaching 100 players, the fact that is a PI source is my main concern. If it can handle the amount of players, you should be fine.

Read full topic

item.title: Starting a new server
item.dc:creator: @Scaar1 Scaar
item.description:
@Scaar1 wrote:

arham 4:

Why think of a vps when starting a new server…?

Because Im going to open it in a few weeks. and i wanna host it on a Vps.

For the first couple of weeks it will be only me and 5 others with access.

Read full topic
